item.title: Old Friend
item.description: My wife and I moved to West Michigan in 2015, and I quickly learned about the plentiful and beautiful locations to hike and spend time in nature.

item.title: Photos - Back Into Nature
item.description: I haven’t been on a hike in an embarrassingly long time.

item.title: Photos - This Round's In The House
item.description: For whatever reason, be it lack of motivation, bad weather, business, or whatever, I just haven’t gotten out to take many photos this year.
